title: Smart Planning - Software Application schema
description: Information on a given Software Application

applicationCategory.description: Property. Type of software application, e.g. 'Game, Multimedia'.

featureList.description: Property. Features or modules provided by this application (and possibly required by other applications).

softwareRequirements.description: Property. Component dependency requirements for application. This includes runtime environments and shared libraries that are not included in the application distribution package, but required to run the application (examples: DirectX, Java or .NET runtime).
